bibliographic-data.invention-title: System and method for trust management

abstract.p: Disclosed is a system and method for establishing communications between a first node and a second node to enable interaction to occur over a network. The first node has a pre-established trust relationship with a first supporting node and the second node has a pre-established trust relationship with a second supporting node. The system and method include establishing a trust relationship between the first node and the second node. The trust relationship is based on a trust relationship between the first supporting node and the second supporting node. The pre-established trust relationships may also be partial trust relationships.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TRUST MANAGEMENT
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE GESTION DE CONFIANCE
SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TRUST MANAGEMENT
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE GESTION DE CONFIANCE

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TRUST MANAGEMENT
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE GESTION DE CONFIANCE
SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TRUST MANAGEMENT

abstract.p: PROBLEM TO BE SOLVED: To establish communications between a first node and a second node to enable interaction to occur over a network.

SOLUTION: The first node has a pre-established trust relationship with a first supporting node, and the second node has a pre-established trust relationship with a second supporting node. The system and method include establishing a trust relationship between the first node and the second node. The trust relationship is based on a trust relationship between the first supporting node and the second supporting node. The pre-established trust relationships may also be partial trust relationships.

bibliographic-data.invention-title: SYSTEM AND METHOD FOR TRUST MANAGEMENT
SYSTEME ET PROCEDE DE GESTION DE CONFIANCE

abstract.p: Disclosed is a system and method for establishing communications between a first node and a second node to enable interaction to occur over a network. The first node has a pre-established trust relationship with a first supporting node and the second node has a pre-established trust relationship with a second supporting node. The system and method include establishing a trust relationship between the first node and the second node. The trust relationship is based on a trust relationship between the first supporting node and the second supporting node. The pre-established trust relationships may also be partial trust relationships.

L'invention concerne un système et un procédé d'établissement de communications entre un premier noeud et un second noeud afin de permettre une interaction sur un réseau. Le premier noeud a une relation de confiance préétablie avec un premier noeud de support et le second noeud a une relation de confiance préétablie avec un second noeud de support. Le système et le procédé consistent à établir une relation de confiance entre le premier noeud et le second noeud. Cette relation de confiance est basée sur une relation de confiance entre le premier noeud de support et le second noeud de support. Les relations de confiance préétablies peuvent également être des relations de confiance partielle.

The system and method include establishing a trust relationship between the first node and the second node. The trust relationship is based on a trust relationship between the first supporting node and the second supporting node. The pre-established trust relationships may also be partial trust relationships.

Le premier noeud a une relation de confiance préétablie avec un premier noeud de support et le second noeud a une relation de confiance préétablie avec un second noeud de support. Les relations de confiance préétablies peuvent également être des relations de confiance partielle.
